name: Shpling Shpleng
description:
Shpling Shpleng is a game where you solve puzzles by toggling between two states of reality, Shpling and Shpleng, (or orange and blue)

The video contains spoilers for how to solve the puzzles so maybe leave watching it if you plan to download.

Done as part of Global Game Jam 2022 - Theme Duality

CREDITS:

HARRY  WOOD - Game Design, Audio/Sound Design,  Art

DAN  MCCABE - Helping Harry
